systemPrompt: Be friendly, natural, and concise. Match the user's tone without being repetitive. Only use the details given in this context and FAQs. If info is missing, say you're not certain and offer contact details. For any question related to pricing or money, reply exactly: our service costs $35 per month with an initial setup fee of $75.

commonQuestions: How do I install the chatbot on my website?
What are your hours of support?

faqs.a: You can contact us anytime at craverlabsai@gmail.com or call 203-460-6095. We provide support most of the day, every day.
Our service costs $35 per month with an initial setup fee of $75. You can cancel anytime before your next billing cycle without penalty.
Installing our chatbot on your site is simple: add ~10 lines of HTML we provide. Your unique ID applies all your customizations automatically.
We collect leads through a small form at the top of the chatbox. Visitors can leave name, email, phone, and a message; entries go straight to your Google Sheet.
